alert.note: Alert for Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 17 at 10:53AM EST until February 19 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Ohio... Cuyahoga River At Independence affecting Cuyahoga County. Cuyahoga River At Old Portage affecting Summit County. Mahoning River At Warren affecting Trumbull County. Mahoning River At Leavittsburg affecting Trumbull County. Mahoning River At Youngstown affecting Mahoning and Trumbull Counties. Eagle Creek At Phalanx Station affecting Trumbull County. Killbuck Creek Near Killbuck affecting Holmes and Wayne Counties. For the Cuyahoga River...including Old Portage, Independence...Major flooding is forecast. For the Killbuck Creek...including Killbuck...Minor flooding is forecast. For the Mahoning River...including Leavittsburg, Warren, Youngstown...Major flooding is forecast. For the Site Specific Non-forecast Pt...including Phalanx Station... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO EARLY SATURDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Major flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Mahoning River At Warren. * WHEN...From this evening to early Saturday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Property near the river south of Market Street flooded, including South Park and Pine Avenue. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:30 AM EST Thursday the stage was 5.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 13.2 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 10.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 12.0 feet on 02/07/2008. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this evening by 900 PM EST.
